io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single color in an effect's palette. Used to store JSON-parsed data.

                            int saturation,
                            int brightness)

        saturation - the saturation of the color
        brightness - the brightness of the color
        Returns:
        a new Color

      • fromHSB

        public static Color fromHSB(int hue,
                            int saturation,
                            int brightness,
                            double probability)
        Creates an HSB instance of Color with probability.
        Parameters:
        hue - the hue of the color
        saturation - the saturation of the color
        brightness - the brightness of the color
        probability - the probability of the color appearing in the effect
        Returns:
        a new Color
